# The `CmpInst` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This class is the base class for the comparison instructions. <a href="#details">More...</a>

<CodeBlock>class llvm::CmpInst</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

This class is the base class for the comparison instructions.

Abstract base class of comparison instructions.

Definition at line 661 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/instrtypes-h">InstrTypes.h</a>.

## Enumerations

### enum  {#a2be3583dac92a031fa1458d4d992c78b}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="enum llvm::CmpInst::Predicate : unsigned">
This enumeration lists the possible predicates for <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cmpinst">CmpInst</a> subclasses.

<EnumerationList title="Enumeration values">

<Link id="a2be3583dac92a031fa1458d4d992c78bae9c013750fff3023001d7e3af8df2d6d" />
<EnumerationListItem name="FCMP_FALSE">
0 0 0 0 Always false (always folded) (= 0)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="a2be3583dac92a031fa1458d4d992c78ba024db78a5ed74f64666f3ca4955e6eca" />
<EnumerationListItem name="FCMP_OEQ">
0 0 0 1 True if ordered and equal (= 1)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="a2be3583dac92a031fa1458d4d992c78ba4c399f525bbcf03d72af4b303e6eeca8" />
<EnumerationListItem name="FCMP_OGT">
0 0 1 0 True if ordered and greater than (= 2)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="a2be3583dac92a031fa1458d4d992c78ba541533f34077bbbcfb703a90f6d2da9b" />

<EnumerationListItem name="FIRST_ICMP_PREDICATE">
 (= ICMP&#95;EQ)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="a2be3583dac92a031fa1458d4d992c78baa5c6e466e2df2c472e487f84531421fc" />
<EnumerationListItem name="LAST_ICMP_PREDICATE">
 (= ICMP&#95;SLE)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="a2be3583dac92a031fa1458d4d992c78ba07aee43ffb66908a25c55c77ce4c0d05" />
<EnumerationListItem name="BAD_ICMP_PREDICATE">
 (= ICMP&#95;SLE + 1)
</EnumerationListItem>

</EnumerationList>

Values in the range 0-31 are reserved for <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fcmpinst">FCmpInst</a>, while values in the range 32-64 are reserved for <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/icmpinst">ICmpInst</a>. This is necessary to ensure the predicate values are not overlapping between the classes.

Some passes (e.g. InstCombine) depend on the bit-wise characteristics of FCMP&#95;&#42; values. Changing the bit patterns requires a potential change to those passes.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/instrtypes-h/#l00673">673</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/instrtypes-h">InstrTypes.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
